title: European Central Bank To Try Its Hand At Quantitative Easing
teaser: The European Central Bank will begin buying up Eurozone country government bonds in a bid to stimulate Europe's flagging economy. The Federal Reserve implemented a similar program after the 2008 financial crisis, and it is credited with helping to keep the U.S. economy on track.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
